User account informations

TODO: Describe

Setup

  • There is a user who is authenticated to your client application
  • The name of the user is “Willis Ford”
  • The zip code of the user is 02102
  • The city of the user is Boston
  • The user has an authorization token of “rRou72pewt102y926jfhwow438238poQR31d”
  • The user has an opened task “My Task” with id 1452

GET /api/v1/account

  • Authorization: OAuth rRou72pewt102y926jfhwow438238poQR31d

Simplified Response

  • Status Code: 200
  • Content-Type: application/json

json { "city": { "id": 1, "name": "Boston" }, "zip_code": "02102", "id": 3766, "tasks": { "items": [ { "name": "My Task", "state": "opened", "city": { "id": 1, "name": "Boston" } } ], "links": { "get": "/api/v1/users/3766/tasks" } }, "first_name": "Willis", "short_name": "Willis", "full_name": "Willis Ford", "last_name": "Ford", "display_name": "Willis F.", "links": { "get": "/api/v1/users/3766", "avatar_url": "http://test.taskrabbit.com/images/default_avatars/poster_thumb.gif" }, "locations": { "items": [], "links": { "get": "/api/v1/users/3766/locations" } } }

Error Cases

Incorrect Authorization

GET /api/v1/account

  • Authorization: OAuth XXXXXX

401 Unauthorized

  • Content-Type: application/json

json { "error":"There must be an authenticated user for this action" }
